attributes.title: TOO MANY GLITCHES
attributes.review: I couldn't even do anything on the app. It glitches so bad. Like it looks like a malfunction. I had to get my phone fixed bc it gave me so many viruses

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app is super slow not to mention it makes me want to throw my phone and never go looking for it , this app heats up my phone soooo much almost as much as gen z heats up donald duck !!!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app takes up sm of my space & is so slow. I couldn’t do anything on the app. It is useless & needs to be deleted

attributes.title: Straight wack
attributes.review: This app is so bad just in general, it has trump supporters that’s all that needs to be said. And it’s slow and makes my WiFi act up really bad

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I got on the app a couple days ago to see what it was about and it didn’t let me do anything. I hate this app and it needs to be removed asap

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: This app is eXtReMelY glitchy and took days just to download. Definitely was a waste of my time👎

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: When I opened this app, I just saw a tangerine, and not a good looking one either, this made me not like tangerines anymore, so thanks to this app I just threw all of my tangerines away😑 ruins my appetite, no ma’am

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I opened the app and for some reason a giant orange 🍊 was in my way I think it was a glitch because I’m pretty sure Obama was supposed to be on the screen but ya know

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: I would expect more from the tRUMP team to make a better app. I mean, if they can’t make an app they can’t run a country. Both happen to be true

attributes.title: worst app DO NOT GET IT 🍊🍊
attributes.review: it took days to download and everything else stopped working. my phone was glitching for weeks and i had to get a new phone 🤬🤬🤬
